string.text: Your crew spots a small fishing boat. The fishermen wave; perhaps trade is possible.
Floating debris and a half-submerged crate drift nearby. Someone may have been shipwrecked — do you investigate?
Leave the wreck to the sea; keep watch instead.
A huge shape breaks the surface nearby — a whale breaches, spraying water and awe across the deck.
Attempt to harvest a sample for the ship's stores.
